title: ComplexCon Hong Kong Tickets Lucky Draw | HSBC One - HSBC HK
content:
Beware of Phishing SMS

HSBC will never ask customers to contact third-party insurance companies via SMS links or phone numbers. All our one-way SMS bears IDs starting with '#' only. Stay vigilant! Learn more.

We use cookies to give you the best possible experience on our website. By continuing to browse this site, you give consent for cookies to be used. For more details please read our Cookie Policy.

Top of the content

Registration for HSBC One 'ComplexCon Hong Kong Tickets' Lucky Draw | Enter Details Registration for HSBC One 'ComplexCon Hong Kong Tickets' Lucky Draw | Enter Details     

Registration for HSBC One 'ComplexCon Hong Kong Tickets' Lucky Draw Registration for HSBC One 'ComplexCon Hong Kong Tickets' Lucky Draw     

Register for the lucky draw and get a chance to win 2 tickets to ComplexCon Hong Kong Concert and Marketplace.

Please correct these errors

    This promotion runs from 12 to 28 February 2025, both dates inclusive.

    Enter your details in English (must be the same as the bank's record) to register for the event.

     

    Personal details

    Enter mobile phone number with the respective area code. For example, Hong Kong mobile phone number would be 85291234567.

    Terms and conditions

    1. These information and offers are intended for persons in Hong Kong.
    2. Each eligible customer can only register and is entitled to join the promotion once.
    3. Completion of registration doesn't represent confirmation of your eligibility for the promotion.
    4. Once you submit the form, you can't amend or cancel your registration.
    5. The personal data collected in the registration will be recorded for this promotion only and will not be used for other purposes. The personal data collected will not be used to update the Bank's records. The data will be destroyed 12 months after the end of this promotion.
    6. Please refer to the full Terms & Conditions below.

    View full terms and conditions  (PDF) this link will open in a new window

    Thanks for registering

    We will notify the winners of the lucky draw on or before 14 March 2025 via email according to the bank's record.

    Explore HSBC One features and offers this link will open in a new window

    Sorry, the form isn't available

    Please try again later.

    Need more help?

    You can reach us via one of the ways listed on our Contact Us pagethis link will open in a new window.
